subject: New York City Marathon
Prices (Fares, Fees and Rates)
Running
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: The delay in a rule that will charge organizers of the New York City Marathon and other races for traffic control and other services, allows race officials time to plan for added costs.
snippet: The delay in a rule that will charge organizers of the New York City Marathon and other races for traffic control and other services, allows race officials time to plan for added costs.
